introVideo.title: A Message from
introVideo.watchVideo: Watch: A Message from Your Teacher
introVideo.whoIAmText: I'm Said, a Moroccan English teacher with years of experience helping adults gain confidence in speaking. I focus on practical, real-life English, not textbook perfection. My goal is to help you speak clearly, naturally, and confidently in any situation.
introVideo.whoThisIsForText: Adults who understand English but struggle to speak it. Professionals, job seekers, or anyone who feels stuck and wants to finally communicate fluently.
introVideo.whatMakesDifferentText: Lessons are personalized for your goals, not a generic curriculum. You speak more than you listen, practice real conversations, and get feedback that actually helps you improve.
introVideo.noPressureText: A safe, supportive environment where mistakes are part of learning. Learn at your pace, and grow at your rhythm.

rules.pageSubtitle: Please read these terms carefully before booking your sessions. By registering with Takalam, you agree to these policies.
rules.payment1: All payments must be made in advance before sessions begin.
rules.payment2: We accept bank transfers (CIH Bank) and PayPal payments.
rules.payment3: Payment proof (screenshot) must be uploaded directly in the registration form before submitting.
rules.payment4: Sessions will only be scheduled after payment is verified.
rules.payment5: Package prices are fixed as listed on the website. Special requests may have different pricing.
rules.refund1: Full refund (100%) available if you cancel before your first session starts.
rules.refund2: 80% refund if you cancel within the first week of starting your package (minus completed sessions).
rules.refund3: 50% refund if you cancel within the first month of starting your package (minus completed sessions).
rules.refund4: No refunds after 30 days from package start date. Plan your commitment carefully.
rules.refund5: Refunds are processed within 7-14 business days to your original payment method.
rules.refund6: For group sessions: Full refund if the group doesn't form within 30 days of payment.
rules.reschedule1: Sessions can be rescheduled with at least 24 hours notice at no extra cost.
rules.reschedule2: Rescheduling requests should be made via WhatsApp.
rules.reschedule3: Same-day rescheduling is subject to availability and may not always be possible.
rules.reschedule4: Each session can only be rescheduled once. Further changes may count as a cancellation.
rules.reschedule5: Rescheduled sessions must be completed within your package validity period.
rules.cancel1: Cancellations with less than 24 hours notice will result in the session being marked as completed.
rules.cancel2: No-shows (missing a session without notice) will be counted as a completed session.
rules.cancel3: If you need to cancel your entire package, contact us as soon as possible for refund eligibility.
rules.cancel4: Repeated last-minute cancellations may result in restrictions on future bookings.
rules.session2: Sessions are conducted via Zoom or Google Meet. The link will be shared before each session.
rules.session3: Please ensure you have a stable internet connection and a quiet environment.
rules.session4: Camera on is recommended for better interaction, but not mandatory.
rules.session5: Be ready at least 5 minutes before your scheduled session time.
rules.session6: If the teacher is unable to attend, the session will be rescheduled at no cost to you.
rules.comm1: Primary communication is through WhatsApp for scheduling and quick questions.
rules.comm2: Response time is typically within 24 hours on business days.
rules.comm3: For urgent matters, please send a WhatsApp message clearly marked as urgent.
rules.comm4: Email (takalamenglishcenter@gmail.com) is available for formal inquiries.
rules.package1: Single sessions must be used within 2 weeks of purchase.
rules.package2: Weekly packages must be completed within 2 weeks of the start date.
rules.package3: Monthly packages must be completed within 5 weeks of the start date.
rules.package4: Trimester packages must be completed within 4 months of the start date.
rules.conduct1: Treat each session with respect and professionalism.
rules.conduct2: Inappropriate behavior or language will result in immediate session termination without refund.
rules.conduct3: Recording of sessions is not permitted without prior written consent.
rules.conduct4: We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone who violates these terms.
rules.group1: Group sessions start only when the required number of learners is registered (5 or 10 depending on group type).
rules.group2: Payment reserves your seat. Your spot is confirmed upon successful payment verification.
rules.group3: If a group does not reach the required number within 30 days, you will receive a full refund.
rules.group4: Group sessions follow a fixed schedule. Rescheduling individual sessions is not possible.
rules.group5: Missed group sessions cannot be made up individually. You are responsible for attending at fixed times.
rules.group6: A free 15-minute oral diagnostic test is provided after payment and before the group starts.
rules.group7: If you miss more than 4 consecutive sessions without notice, your spot may be given to another learner.
rules.group8: Learners who drop out after the group starts do not affect remaining learners' schedules.
rules.groupComm1: No WhatsApp communication is provided by default for group sessions.
rules.groupComm2: Before payment, please read all FAQ and Terms & Conditions carefully.
rules.groupComm3: After payment, wait to be contacted by Takalam. Do not initiate contact via WhatsApp.
rules.groupComm4: For urgent matters only, contact via email: takalamenglishcenter@gmail.com
rules.groupComm5: WhatsApp is used only if Takalam initiates contact with you.
rules.groupComm6: Once your group is complete, Takalam will contact you to confirm the schedule and start date.
rules.questionsText: If you have any questions about our policies, don't hesitate to reach out.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before getting started.

private.q1: What level of English do I need to start?
private.a1: Any level! Whether you're a complete beginner or advanced speaker looking to refine your skills, lessons are personalized to your current level and goals.
private.q2: What if I miss a scheduled session?
private.a2: You can reschedule with 24 hours notice at no extra cost. Sessions missed without notice are counted as completed. See our full policy on the Terms & Policies page.
private.a3: Just a smartphone, tablet, or computer with a stable internet connection. We use Zoom or Google Meet - both are free and easy to use.
private.a4: Each private session is 50 minutes long - enough time to make real progress while keeping you engaged and focused.
private.q5: Can I change my package later?
private.a5: Yes! You can upgrade to a larger package anytime. Contact us to discuss your options and we'll help you transition smoothly.
private.q6: What payment methods do you accept?
private.a6: We accept bank transfers (CIH Bank) and PayPal. Payment must be completed before your first session.
private.q7: Can I switch my scheduled time slot?
private.a7: Yes, you can change your regular time slot with at least 48 hours notice, subject to availability. Frequent changes may not always be accommodated.
private.q8: What's the refund policy for unused sessions?
private.a8: Refunds for unused sessions follow our Terms & Policies: 80% refund within first week, 50% within first month, no refunds after 30 days. See full details on Terms page.

group.a1: Groups start only when all seats are filled. Group of 10 starts when 10 learners register. Group of 5 starts when 5 learners register. Takalam will contact you once your group is complete.
group.q2: What happens if the group doesn't fill up?
group.a2: If a group doesn't reach the required number of learners within 30 days, you will receive a full refund. You can also choose to transfer to another group or switch to private sessions.
group.q3: Is there a diagnostic test for groups?
group.a3: Yes! After payment and once the group is complete, you'll receive a free 15-minute oral diagnostic test to assess your level before sessions begin.
group.a4: Group sessions are 1 hour long, held twice per week on a fixed schedule. You'll learn alongside other motivated adults at a similar level.
group.q5: Can I contact Takalam via WhatsApp?
group.a5: No. Please read the FAQ and Terms before payment. After payment, wait to be contacted by Takalam. For urgent matters only, use email. WhatsApp is used only if Takalam initiates contact.
group.q6: What's the difference between Group of 5 and Group of 10?
group.a6: Group of 5 offers more speaking time per learner and more personalized attention at 400 MAD/month. Group of 10 is more affordable at 200 MAD/month with the same teaching quality.
group.q7: What happens if someone drops out of my group?
group.a7: If a learner drops out after the group has started, sessions continue normally. The remaining learners actually benefit from more speaking time. The dropped seat may be filled with a new learner.
group.q8: Can I switch to a different time slot after joining?
group.a8: No. Group schedules are fixed and cannot be changed once the group starts. Make sure you can commit to the time slot before registering.
group.q9: What if I miss a group session?
group.a9: Missed group sessions cannot be rescheduled or made up. You're responsible for attending at the fixed times. Frequent absences may affect your learning progress.
group.q10: How long does the refund process take?
group.a10: Refunds are processed within 7-14 business days after approval. Bank transfers may take additional time depending on your bank.
